8 bit.gadget: Cheat Cartridge. Extra Credits sometimes in Heist.
8 bit.starpower: Boosted Booster. Plugged In for Gem Grab or bad matchups (high damage, long range, or splash).

alli.starpower: You Better Run, You Better Take Cover.

amber.gadget: Fire Starters for super. Dancing Flames in closed maps.
amber.starpower: Wild Flames. Scorchin' Siphon awkward to use.

angelo.gadget: Master Fletcher. Stinging Flight isn't a bad option either.

barley.gadget: Sticky Syrup Mixer is good into agro. Herbal Tonic good in Knockout and Hot Zone.
barley.starpower: Extra Noxious. Medical Use is better to push up against other throwers or when outranged.

bea.gadget: Rattled Hive. Honey Molasses decent into Gene or to tank shot.
bea.starpower: Honeycomb. Insta Beaload can also be great into tanks.

belle.gadget: Nest Egg. Reverse Polarity underrated in some Knockout maps.
belle.starpower: Positive Feedback. Grounded underrated in Ranked against agro.

berry.gadget: Friendship is Great. Healthy Additives in Heist.
berry.tips: Attack is impact + damage zone after. Damage zone doesn't stack. Weak vs tanks

brock.gadget: Rocket Fuel lets you open up the map against throwers and tanks. Rocket Laces provides counterplay into assassins.
brock.starpower: More Rockets! Rocket No. 4 if you prefer occasionally bursting enemies with main attack.

bull.gadget: Stomper. T-Bone Injector can be used for Heist base races.
bull.starpower: Tough Guy. Berserker hard to get value out of but can be good in Heist.

buzz.gadget: Reserve Buoy. X-Ray-Shades is very good on grassy maps.
buzz.starpower: Tougher Torpedo better into tanks. Eyes Sharp works well with X-Ray-Shades

byron.gadget: Booster Shots. Shot in the Arm isn't bad either.
byron.starpower: Malaise. Injection has some uses in Hot Zone.

carl.gadget: Heat Ejector in bushy maps or into tanks. Flying Hook makes Carl a blue star slave in Bounty or to pounce on squishy brawlers.

charlie.gadget: Spiders. Personal Space if Gem Grab gem carrier or into a lot of pierce.
charlie.starpower: Slimy. Digestive only helps if you hit the super and if enemy is at full health.

chuck.gadget: Rerouting in Heist. Ghost Train if you're doing some trolling outside of Heist.
chuck.starpower: Pit Stop. Outside of Heist try Tickets Please!

clancy.gadget: Snappy Shooting. Tactical Retreat for good matchups
clancy.tips: Stage one sucks and requires getting out of asap.

colette.starpower: Mass Tax. Push It can be good into some tanks.

colt.gadget: Speedloader for open maps or Heist. Silver Bullet good for opening up map.
colt.starpower: Magnum Special is good in Heist. Slick Boots might be bugged but helps if you like juking.

cordelius.gadget: Replanting. Poison Mushroom good into agro.

crow.starpower: Extra Toxic. Carrion Crow into tanks.

darryl.gadget: Tar Barrel. Recoiling Rotator in Heist.
darryl.starpower: Steel Hoops. Rolling Reload only if a Heist map is a heavy base race.

draco.starpower: Shredding. Expose helps in Heist base races.
draco.tips: Pairs great with Kit, Byron when supering. Great for when pressure is needed (hot zone, etc.)

dynamike.gadget: Satchel Charge. Fidget Spinner is underrated.
dynamike.starpower: Demolition. Dyna-Jump has some very small niches into assassins or wall heavy maps restricting movement.

el primo.starpower: Meteor Rush in Brwal Ball. El Fuego is good into squishy brawlers.

eve.starpower: Unnatural Order. Happy Surprise on paper better but can be inconsistent.
eve.gear: Reload Speed and Shield (Knockout and Bounty)/Damage (Heist)/Quadruplets.

fang.gadget: Corn-Fu. Roundhouse Kick for main attack animation cancelling.
fang.starpower: Divine Soles. Fresh Kicks better against bad players.

frank.gadget: Irresistible Attraction. Active Noise Cancelling is decent depending on matchup.

gale.gadget: Twister. Spring Ejector good for certain maps (Parallel Plays).
gale.gear: Damage and Shield. Speed and Vision in grassy maps.

gene.gadget: Vengeful Spirits in Bounty and Knockout. Lamp Blowout into agro in Gem Grab.
gene.starpower: Magic Puffs. Spirit Slap against lots of agro.
gene.gear: Talk to the Hand and Vision/Shield.

gray.gadget: Walking Cane. Grand Piano sometimes in Out in the Open
gray.starpower: New Perspective. Fake Injury in Knockout and Bounty.

griff.starpower: Business Resilience. Keep the Change underrated into tanks.
griff.tips: Midrange wallbreaker. Use on any map you need a wallbreak + midrange on

grom.gadget: Radio Check. Watchtower in Center Stage or to tank single attacks.

hank.gadget: Barricade. Water Balloons higher skill floor but good into tanks.

jacky.starpower: Counter Crush. Hardy Hard Hat into very bad matchups.

janet.gadget: Backstage Pass for claw grip. Drop the Bass for bushy maps.
janet.gear: Speed and Vision for grassy maps. Otherwise Damage and Shield.

jessie.gadget: Spark Plug. Recoil Spring in Heist
jessie.gear: Damage and Shield. Vision and Speed on grassy maps.

juju.starpower: Numbing Needles into tanks. Guarded Gris-Gris into ranged enemies.

kaze.gadget: Hensojutsu. Gracious Host is better in modes where invisibility isn't needed.

kenji.tips: Can dash into wall and then use swipe to wall peak for more dmg/range

kit.starpower: Overly Attached in 3v3. Power Hungry in Showdown.

leon.starpower: Smoke Trails is really good at surprising people. Invisiheal is also helpful.

lola.starpower: Sealed with a Kiss. Improvise decent in Heist.

lou.gadget: Cryo Syrup. Ice Block helps with Hot Zone survivability.

mandy.gadget: Cookie Crumbs. Caramelize pairs well with super and is viable in aggressive modes or more open maps.

meeple.gadget: Mansions of Meeple. Ragequit is good into assassins or Brawl Ball.
meeple.starpower: Do Not Pass Go. Rule Bending is guaranteed benefit in an open map.

melodie.gadget: Interlude. Perfect Pitch can work in weird maps (Triple Dribble).

mico.gadget: Clipping Scream. Presto helps in certain maps.
mico.starpower: Record Smash (since he's only good in Heist/Showdown). Monkey Business if you need to primarily attack players.

mina.gadget: Capo-What? Windmill will be good in Knockout and Bounty.
mina.starpower: Zum Zum Zum seems toxic. Blown Away will synergize well with Capo-What?

moe.starpower: Skipping Stones. Speeding Ticket for Bounty and Knockout to extend your main attack range.

mr p.gear: Damage and Shield. Other gears are viable.

nani.gadget: Return to Sender to counter snipers. Warpin' Time better outside of Knockout and Bounty with Tempered Steel.

nita.gadget: Faux Fur. Use Bear Paws against agro.
nita.starpower: Bear With Me. Hyper Bear for Heist or into agro.

ollie.gadget: All Eyez on Me has lower cooldown and helps into bad matchups. Regulate still good.
ollie.starpower: Renegade. Kick, Push can be useful on certain maps like Belle's Rock.

otis.gear: Speed and Vision for grassy maps. Otherwise use Damage and Gadget Cooldown/Super Charge.

pam.starpower: Mama's Squeeze. Mama's Hug in a very open map.
pam.gear: Super Turret and Health/Vision (grassy map)/Gadget Cooldown.

penny.starpower: Heavy Coffers. Master Blaster against agro.

piper.gadget: Homemade Recipe in Bounty and Knockout. Auto Aimer in her washed modes like Gem Grab and Brawl Ball.
piper.starpower: Snappy Sniping. Ambush can be okay in very bushy maps.

poco.gadget: Tuning Fork pairs well with tanks. Protective Tunes counters a lot of status condiitons in Ranked. Both gadgets are underwhelming due to their cooldowns.
poco.starpower: Screeching Solo helps with Poco's low DPS.

r t.gadget: Out of Line. Hacks! in long range matchups.
r t.starpower: Recording. If you never have to split use Quick Maths.

rico.gadget: Multiball Launcher. Bouncy Castle for Knockout.

rosa.gadget: Unfriendly Bushes. Enemies can take over your bush if you die after using Grow Light
rosa.starpower: Thorny Gloves helps with Rosa's damage.

ruffs.gadget: Air Support guarantees map pressure. Take Cover can be good into single shot brawlers.
ruffs.starpower: Air Superiority. Field Promotion for Bounty cheese.

shelly.starpower: Band-Aid is slightly better than Shell Shock but both have an about even amount of little impact.

spike.gadget: Life Plant. Popping Pincushion on Heist.
spike.starpower: Curveball. Fertilize very underrated in this meta.

squeak.gadget: Windup. Residue is useful in bushy maps.
squeak.starpower: Super Sticky better for super cycling. Chain Reaction is good with Windup.

stu.gadget: Speed Zone. Breakthrough for individual matchups or wall break.

surge.gadget: Power Surge. Power Shield for ladder noob stomping.

tara.gadget: Support From Beyond. Psychic Enhancer against pierce.
tara.starpower: Healing Shade. Black Portal further punishes single shot brawlers.

tick.gadget: Last Hurrah. Mine Mania can be toxic in certain Knockout situations
tick.starpower: Well Oiled. Automa-Tick Reload if going into a free matchup

trunk.gadget: Worker Ants wastes an enemy's ammo. For the Queen! was better before they got the tank trait.

willow.gadget: Dive delays your death but can waste enemy super. Spellbound is underrated.
willow.starpower: Love is Blind. Obsession better in Brawl Ball.

ziggy.gadget: Electric Shuffle. Now You See Me... will be good defensively.
